if distance <= catch_distance:print("æ•è™«ç½‘å·²æŠ“ä½è¤ç«è™«ï¼")return None# æ•è™«ç½‘æœç€è¤ç«è™«çš„æ–¹å‘ç§»åŠ¨direction = [firefly_position[i] - net_position[i] for i in range(3)] # æ•è™«ç½‘åˆ°è¤ç«è™«çš„æ–¹å‘å‘é‡magnitude = calculate_distance([0, 0, 0], direction) # æ–¹å‘å‘é‡çš„å¤§å°# å½’ä¸€åŒ–æ–¹å‘å‘é‡direction = [d / magnitude for d in direction]# æ•è™«ç½‘é€Ÿåº¦æ˜¯è¤ç«è™«çš„ä¸¤å€net_move = [d * net_speed_ratio for d in direction] # æ•è™«ç½‘çš„ç§»åŠ¨æ–¹å‘next_position = [net_position[i] + net_move[i] for i in range(3)] # æ•è™«ç½‘çš„ä¸‹ä¸€æ­¥ä½ç½®return next_positionç»˜åˆ¶ä¸‰ç»´å›¾å½¢ # def plot_3d(net_position, firefly_position): fig = plt.figure() ax = fig.add_subplot(111, projection=‘3d’)
